trans-unit.source: Represents the control that redistributes space between columns or rows of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Grid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Representerar den kontroll som distribuerar mellanrummet mellan kolumner eller rader i en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Grid"> </xref> kontroll.

trans-unit.source: The GridSplitter control redistributes space between rows or columns in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>, without changing the dimensions of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen GridSplitter omfördelas avståndet mellan rader eller kolumner i en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>utan ändra måtten på <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>

trans-unit.source: For example, when a GridSplitter resizes two columns, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A> property of one column is increased while at the same time the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A> property of the other column is decreased by the same amount.
trans-unit.target: Till exempel när en GridSplitter ändrar två kolumner i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A>-egenskapen för en kolumn ökas medan samtidigt i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A>-egenskapen för den andra kolumnen minskas med samma grad.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows how to define a horizontal or vertical GridSplitter by setting the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> properties and by leaving the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> properties set to their default values.
trans-unit.target: Följande tabell visar hur du definierar en vågrät eller lodrät GridSplitter genom att ange den <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>och <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>Egenskaper och genom att låta den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A>och <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A>Egenskaper som har angetts till sina standardvärden.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: **How to create vertical and horizontal GridSplitter controls** |GridSplitter type|<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> value|<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> value| |-----------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |Resizes rows|<xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>|<xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>, <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>, <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>| |Resizes columns|<xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>, <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>, <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>|<xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>| |If <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A> is greater than or equal to <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A>, this resizes the columns.
trans-unit.target: **Så här skapar du vågräta och lodräta GridSplitter kontroller** | GridSplitter typen | värdet för <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>| värdet för <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>| |-----------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| | Ändrar storlek på rader | <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>| <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>, <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>, <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>| | Ändrar storlek på kolumner | <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>, <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>, <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>|<xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>| | Om <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A>är större än eller lika med <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A>, detta ändrar storlek på kolumner.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A> is less than <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A>, this resizes the rows.|<xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>|<xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>| A GridSplitter can overlap a row or column that contains other content, or it can occupy a row or column by itself.
trans-unit.target: Om <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A>är mindre än <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A>, detta ändrar storlek på rader. | <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>| <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>| En GridSplitter kan överlappa en rad eller kolumn som innehåller andra innehåll eller det kan ta upp en rad eller kolumn ensamt.</xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to define a GridSplitter, see [How to: Resize Rows with a GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [How to: Resize Columns with a GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Läs mer om hur du definierar en GridSplitter [så här: ändra storlek på rader med en GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) och [så här: ändra storlek på kolumner med en GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> property settings do not achieve the desired GridSplitter behavior, you can change the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> property settings.
trans-unit.target: Om den <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>och <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>egenskapsinställningar inte blir beteenden som önskas GridSplitter kan du ändra den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A>och <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A>egenskapsinställningar.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: A GridSplitter may be obscured by other objects that are contained in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>.
trans-unit.target: En GridSplitter kan döljas av andra objekt som ingår i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A>samlingen i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information about how to prevent this situation, see [How to: Make Sure That a GridSplitter Is Visible](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Information om hur du förhindrar att den här situationen finns [så här: se till att en GridSplitter är synlig](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: Beroendeegenskaper för den här kontrollen kan ställas in av kontrollens standardformat.

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: Om en egenskapen anges av ett standardformat kan egenskapen ändras från standardvärdet när kontrollen visas i programmet.

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: Standardformatet som bestäms av vilka tema används när programmet körs.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: Mer information finns i [standard WPF teman](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum distance that a user must drag a mouse to resize rows or columns with a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger det minsta avstånd som en användare måste dra en mus för att ändra storlek på rader eller kolumner med en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> kontroll.

trans-unit.source: The minimum distance that is defined by DragIncrement is reinitialized continually as the user drags the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Det minsta avstånd som definieras av DragIncrement initieras på nytt kontinuerligt som användaren drar musen.

trans-unit.source: For example, when you drag the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> by the DragIncrement amount, the rows or columns are resized.
trans-unit.target: Till exempel när du drar den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>med DragIncrement-mängd rader eller kolumner storlek.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: To resize the rows and columns more, you must drag the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> the same amount.
trans-unit.target: Ändra storlek på rader och kolumner mer genom att dra den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>lika mycket.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, changes to column and row sizes that are made by using the mouse or the keyboard to move the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> are made in multiples of the DragIncrement.
trans-unit.target: Därför ändras till kolumn- och storlekar som görs med hjälp av musen eller tangentbordet för att flytta den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>görs i multiplar av DragIncrement.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ## Beroendeegenskapsinformation ||| |-|-| | ID-fältet | | | Metadata egenskaperna `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: A value that represents the minimum distance that a user must use the mouse to drag a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> to resize rows or columns.
trans-unit.target: Ett värde som representerar det minsta avstånd som en användare måste använda musen drar ett <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> att ändra storlek på rader eller kolumner.

trans-unit.source: The default is 1.
trans-unit.target: Standard är 1.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.DragIncrement*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifierar den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.DragIncrement*>beroendeegenskap.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.DragIncrement*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the distance that each press of an arrow key moves a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger avståndet mellan varje gång du trycker på en piltangent flyttar en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> kontroll.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ## Beroendeegenskapsinformation ||| |-|-| | ID-fältet | | | Metadata egenskaperna `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: The distance that the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> moves for each press of an arrow key.
trans-unit.target: Avståndet som den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> flyttar för varje gång du trycker på en piltangent.

trans-unit.source: The default is 10.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet är 10.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.KeyboardIncrement*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifierar den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.KeyboardIncrement*>beroendeegenskap.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.KeyboardIncrement*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Creates the implementation of <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Skapar implementeringen av <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> för den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> kontroll.

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridSplitterAutomationPeer"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En ny <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridSplitterAutomationPeer"> </xref> för den här <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip"> </xref> kontroll.

trans-unit.source: Called when a key is pressed.
trans-unit.target: Anropas när en tangent trycks.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs"> </xref> som innehåller informationen om händelsen.

trans-unit.source: Called when the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control loses keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: Anropas när den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> kontroll förlorar fokus.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs"> </xref> som innehåller informationen om händelsen.

trans-unit.source: Responds to a change in the dimensions of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Svarar på en ändring i dimensioner för den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> kontroll.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> control determines what type of pointer to display after its <xref:System.Windows.Size> is set.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>kontrollen avgör vilken typ av visaren ska visas efter dess <xref:System.Windows.Size>har angetts.</xref:System.Windows.Size> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: Information about the change in size of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Information om ändringen i storleken på den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style that customizes the appearance, effects, or other style characteristics for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control preview indicator that is displayed when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview*> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger det format som anpassar utseende, effekter eller andra format egenskaper för den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> kontroll preview indikatorn som visas när den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview*>egenskap är inställd på <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview*>

trans-unit.source: When you set styles, there are some restrictions.
trans-unit.target: Det finns vissa begränsningar när du ställa in stilar.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Styling and Templating](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Mer information finns i [design och Templating](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values `ResourceExtension` One of the following: `StaticResource` or `DynamicResource`.
trans-unit.target: ## XAML attributsyntax ``` ``` ## XAML värden `ResourceExtension` något av följande: `StaticResource` eller `DynamicResource`.

trans-unit.source: See [XAML Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Se [XAML resurser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: `StyleResourceKey` The key that identifies the style being requested.
trans-unit.target: `StyleResourceKey`Den nyckel som identifierar det format som begärs.

trans-unit.source: The key refers to an existing resource in a <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.
trans-unit.target: Nyckeln som refererar till en befintlig resurs i <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.</xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Property element syntax is technically possible, but not recommended.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Egenskapselementsyntax är tekniskt möjligt, men inte rekommenderas.

trans-unit.source: See [Inline Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Se [infogade format och mallar](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A binding reference using or <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> is also possible, but uncommon.
trans-unit.target: En bindning referens med eller <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>är också möjligt, men ovanliga.</xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None| A preview of changes to row or column boundaries is displayed while the user drags the control, and the property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: ## Beroendeegenskapsinformation ||| |-|-| | ID-fältet | | | Metadata egenskaperna `true`| Ingen | En förhandsgranskning av ändringar av gränser för raden eller kolumnen visas när användaren laggar den kontroll och egenskap är inställd på `true`.

trans-unit.source: The column and row boundaries are set when the user releases the mouse button.
trans-unit.target: Kolumn- och gränser anges när användaren släpper musknappen.

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref href="System.Windows.Style"></xref> for the preview indicator that shows the potential change in <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Grid"></xref> dimensions as you move the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar den <xref href="System.Windows.Style"> </xref> för indikatorn förhandsgranskningen som visar risken ändras i <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Grid"> </xref> dimensioner när du flyttar den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> kontroll.

trans-unit.source: The default is the style that the current theme supplies.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet är det format som det aktuella temat tillhandahåller.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.PreviewStyle*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifierar den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.PreviewStyle*>beroendeegenskap.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.PreviewStyle*>

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.PreviewStyle%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifieraren för den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.PreviewStyle%2A>beroendeegenskap.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.PreviewStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets which columns or rows are resized relative to the column or row for which the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control is defined.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger vilka kolumner eller rader storlek i förhållande till den kolumn eller rad som den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> kontroll definieras.

trans-unit.source: To specify a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> that resizes rows or columns, set the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Ange en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>som ändrar storlek på rader eller kolumner genom att ange den <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>och <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: If you cannot achieve the desired behavior by setting the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> properties, change the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> or ResizeBehavior default values.
trans-unit.target: Om du inte uppnå önskat beteende genom att ange den <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>och <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>Egenskaper, ändra den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A>eller ResizeBehavior standardvärden.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Resize Rows with a GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [How to: Resize Columns with a GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Mer information finns i [så här: ändra storlek på rader med en GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) och [så här: ändra storlek på kolumner med en GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ## Beroendeegenskapsinformation ||| |-|-| | ID-fältet | | | Metadata egenskaperna `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that indicates which columns or rows are resized by this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En av de uppräkningsvärden som anger vilka kolumner eller rader ändras av detta <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> kontroll.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridResizeBehavior"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet är <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridResizeBehavior"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifierar den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior*>beroendeegenskap.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior*>

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifieraren för den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A>beroendeegenskap.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control resizes rows or columns.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger ett värde som anger om den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> kontrollen ändrar storlek på rader eller kolumner.

trans-unit.source: To specify a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> that resizes rows or columns, set the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Ange en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>som ändrar storlek på rader eller kolumner genom att ange den <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>och <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: If you cannot achieve the desired behavior by setting the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> properties, change the ResizeDirection or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> default values.
trans-unit.target: Om du inte uppnå önskat beteende genom att ange den <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>och <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>Egenskaper, ändra ResizeDirection eller <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A>standardvärdena.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Resize Rows with a GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [How to: Resize Columns with a GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Mer information finns i [så här: ändra storlek på rader med en GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) och [så här: ändra storlek på kolumner med en GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ## Beroendeegenskapsinformation ||| |-|-| | ID-fältet | | | Metadata egenskaperna `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies whether to resize rows or columns.
trans-unit.target: En av de uppräkningsvärden som anger om du vill ändra storlek på rader eller kolumner.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridResizeDirection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet är <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridResizeDirection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifierar den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection*>beroendeegenskap.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control updates the column or row size as the user drags the control.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger ett värde som anger om den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> kontrollen uppdateras den kolumn eller rad storleken när användaren drar kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> requires an <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator> object to be present in its parent tree in order to display drag preview feedback.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>kräver en <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator>objekt måste finnas i dess överordnade träd för att visa dra preview feedback.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: This requirement is typically met by the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator> object that is available in the default style for the <xref:System.Windows.Window> or in the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator> object that is created by a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> object.
trans-unit.target: Detta krav uppfylls vanligtvis av den <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator>objekt som är tillgängliga i standardformat för den <xref:System.Windows.Window>eller i den <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator>objekt som skapas av en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>objektet.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator> </xref:System.Windows.Window> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator>

trans-unit.source: However, if neither of these is available, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> control must define its own <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator> object.
trans-unit.target: Om inget av dessa är dock tillgängligt, den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>kontroll måste definiera en egen <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator>objektet.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None| When the ShowsPreview property is set to `true`, a preview of the change in the row or column sizes is shown.
trans-unit.target: ## Beroendeegenskapsinformation ||| |-|-| | ID-fältet | | | Metadata egenskaperna `true`| Ingen | När egenskapen ShowsPreview har angetts `true`, visas en förhandsgranskning av ändringen i rad eller kolumn storlekar.

trans-unit.source: The actual size changes when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> is released.
trans-unit.target: Den verkliga storleken ändras när den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>släpps.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: If the property is set to `false`, the column or row sizes are updated in real time as the user drags the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> control.
trans-unit.target: Om egenskapen anges till `false`, storlekar kolumn eller rad har uppdaterats i realtid som användaren laggar den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: If the keyboard is used to move the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> control, column or row sizes are updated in real time even if the ShowsPreview property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Om tangentbordet för att flytta den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>kontroll, kolumn eller rad storlekar uppdateras i realtid, även om egenskapen ShowsPreview anges till `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> preview is displayed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> förhandsgranskning är visas, annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet är <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifierar den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview*>beroendeegenskap.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.
